website_summaries.verdict: Ideal for those looking for a mechanical keyboard that is easy to travel with.
pros: The mechanical keys come with a 2-year warranty and keep up with every keystroke
The braided USB cable is detachable and the keyboard comes with a carrying case
The compact design makes it easier to transport while still easy and comfortable to use
cons: The keys are a little loud, even for a mechanical keyboard

customer_reviews.title: Prone To Fail: Had To Buy 2nd One Because Old One Died (Key Damaged)
customer_reviews.text: This is already my 2nd one because the old one died after about 2 years, which is very sad and disappointing at this price level. But I love it regarding features and hence I still wanted to buy again. Really nice support of many games with interactive light activation / deactivation of keys to show what's active / inactive in the game. Also light flow show is impressive and keyboard very good to use .... but still disappointing to see one key died after only 2 years.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Supper good works great!
customer_reviews.text: I used to own the blackwidow stealth but this thing is much better I am rebuilding my setup and I have been using my family computer on a membrane keyboard I can safely say I typed fast on the mechanical at 55-60 words per min on my first type test on the new keyboard while on membrane keyboards I get about 45-50. My only complaint is the black on black looks a little plane so I took the cover off the keyboard and am painting it white. DO THAT AT YOU OUR RISK.
customer_reviews.author: Candace H Quebe

customer_reviews.title: ... its my first clicky mechanical keyboard and i do like that when you here the click its done
customer_reviews.text: very smooth keyboard its my first clicky mechanical keyboard and i do like that when you here the click its done , while gaming you cant afford to be smashing a button you need to know that a button has been used each time you use it , and the synapse color editing to the keyboard well you can spend hours creating your own ripples and waves and color patterns for and assign them to each program or you can download pre made ones i would recommend this and have bought another one for my son .
customer_reviews.author: mikeyz33

customer_reviews.title: So I bit the bullet and was going to upgrade ...
customer_reviews.text: So I bit the bullet and was going to upgrade from my sidewinder x4....Well I'm still typing this review from it. I have had a few dealings with Razer before this but I am not calling them ever again. Wait the 4 days to get this keyboard only to find the M key works 1 out of 4 to 6 presses unless you smash the mess out of it.
customer_reviews.author: JCantrell

customer_reviews.title: LOUD AND PROUD
customer_reviews.text: My stream may hate this keyboard because of how heavy handed I am on it, but if you're one for loud keyboards this one is for you. It also has perfect spacing between each key and I love the chroma personalization. I've always wanted a keyboard just like this. I would recommend getting a silicone wrist raiser for the most comfortable use of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Alaina

customer_reviews.title: My first mechanical keyboard
customer_reviews.text: I bit the bullet and upgraded to a mechanical keyboard. I tried a standard wireless membrane keyboard for gaming and it was an awful experience. Even my membrane gaming keyboard can't compare to the feel of this keyboard. I like the compact size although at times I miss the numeric keypad.
customer_reviews.author: Jon W

customer_reviews.title: Perfect if you have a small space for keyboard and mouse
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I wanted it for. I never use macro keys or the number pad on keyboards, had a smaller area for my keyboard and mouse and I would constantly hit the keyboard when moving my mouse. This Keyboard is small just cause it doesn't have any extra macro keys and it doesn't have the number pad. It feels great to use and has a strangely satisfying sound with the mechanical key clacks when typing. Arrived and works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Matty K

customer_reviews.title: Middle man review
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my avid gamer son, he requested it for Christmas. He has been using it almost daily for 4 months and he loves it. I asked, and he said that it hasn't lost any of its "brightness" and it is "comfortable" to use for long periods of gaming. If he is happy and would re-purchase again, then I know it's good quality.
customer_reviews.author: MBC

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: This is such an amazing keyboard with all the color options and the nice build stile and the amazing sounds. I love this keyboard and I highly recommended it.
customer_reviews.author: sheldor2303

customer_reviews.title: Two defective keyboards in a row
customer_reviews.text: Pros: looks nice, feels sturdy, overally beautiful keyboard Cons: Buttons don't respond or type 2-3 letters each time, loud Got a defective keyboard exchanged it for another because of the F getting stuck and typing multiple times. Second keyboard did the same but with N. Tried clearing up the problem with both keyboards, dust removal, re-installed drivers, etc - no success. Will be returning this keyboard and getting another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Torres

customer_reviews.title: Greatest Keyboard Ever
customer_reviews.text: I mainly use my keyboard for gaming and typing messages to my friends and this keyboard works beautifully for that purpose. It's very responsive and satisfying to use especially with the mechanical keys. It's perfectly compacted design fits great for my cramped desk and still lets me type at ease. The lighting is entrancing and extremely smooth. The Synapse 3 program is easy to use when changing the colors of the lights on the keyboard. This is hands down the best keyboard I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves, a little loud
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for christmas this year. He is a BIG pc gamer. He already had the matching mouse but was debating on the keyboard. The results is ....he absolutely loves it!!! The colors are bright and it automatically synced with his mouse. When he joined his game (overwatch) the main keys light up in a different color than the board. Reminder, all this happened without him changing any settings for the keyboard . It was pretty cool. Higly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Best keyboard Ive ever had
customer_reviews.text: Best keyboard Ive ever had. There was an issue with the letter y sticking and customer service helped me resolve it quickly. I love the sound of the mechanical keys on this keyboard. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Tony G

customer_reviews.title: Well I'll be!
customer_reviews.text: Using this for gaming and work for my new build. So far it is working alright for me. I shouldve gotten the one with the wrist pad but this one had a good bargain. Eh i could always get one for it right?
customer_reviews.author: Gernon

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful design
customer_reviews.text: I love the look and feel for this keyboard the switches are nice and i feel no delays. Not having a number pad was an adjustment but i love how much more room i have on my desk! You also can't go wrong the the chromas, they are such a nice touch. I am a twitch streamer who games a ton and i will recommend this to everyone i know. - ChanceFrags
customer_reviews.author: Chance welch

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for about 30 seconds
customer_reviews.text: I play a game that only required the arrow keys, to talk you have to hit enter, which on the opposite side of the keyboard. somehow hitting arrow keys on this keyboard randomly opens the talk option and renders me immobile. first day i had it. worthless to me and a waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Rob Englehardt

customer_reviews.title: Broken after 3 years
customer_reviews.text: The key for the letter that comes second in the @lphbet stopped working consistently after 3 years. I don't even use this keybord every d@y. Will not buy another r@zor product.
customer_reviews.author: AtticCleaner

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: This is the nicest keyboard I’ve ever owned. I love how ergonomic it feels and the response time is stupid fast
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my son and it is amazing. I wish I would have gotten the one with the key pad but he didn't mind. He is very happy with the color effects that this product allows you change and customize. We got a matching mouse and they work in tandem. Awesome product.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Best keyboard I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: This is the best keyboard I've ever owned. Not a single complaint about it. Keys work perfectly. Was shipped in perfect condition even though it was used. I was expecting at least some scratches but nope it arrived to me perfectly. I love this keyboard so much I almost want to buy another one for up at work. Definitely would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Wanted one of these for years...
customer_reviews.text: Wanted one of these for years, and I get a smile on my face everytime I type on this and it just feels smooth, and comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Mahmoud Abdelmagid

customer_reviews.title: headline
customer_reviews.text: Replacement for my BlackWidow Ultimate 2013(i think) has absolutely everything I wanted minus a passthrough USB and a number pad, both of which I knew when ordering. Backlighting is great, especially for Synapse supported games like Overwatch. Easy to use and transport, nice feeling keys, even came with a case I can put it in when I go to lan. In a related matter, separate mechanical number pads are cheap, as are bits of velcro with adhesive on the back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY PLEASE!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly being a first time PC gamer I heard so many great things about this. I had a key go bad and that is literally the worst feeling ever no 24/7 support. So now I just lost 90 bucks. DO NOT BUY THIS!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Claud K.

customer_reviews.title: Not even a year later and the keys dint work anymore.
customer_reviews.text: I have been lightly using this keyboard for barely a year, and it's gotten to a point where it's unusable. Every time you press a key, it types the letter 2-3 times. Makes writing horribly frustrating. Definitely will be sticking to logitech keyboards in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Tim Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: JUst what I need I used to have the Blackwidow chroma but it was too big for my desk but this one fits perfect nice carry case long usb cable.
customer_reviews.author: rob

customer_reviews.title: Great keyboard. I love the sound and the lighting ...
customer_reviews.text: Great keyboard. I love the sound and the lighting is really cool. I wish that the coating on the keyboard was more resistant to smudges. Other that that its a great keyboard and does its job.
customer_reviews.author: Pinto

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a smaller RGB keyboard that would preform well during fast paced gaming. This Razer keyboard exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.author: Falconlx

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my need
customer_reviews.text: I love this keyboard and would definitely buy it again
customer_reviews.author: Nick Singleton

customer_reviews.title: It's good
customer_reviews.text: As advertised, everything is included. Does not have numpad though
customer_reviews.author: Aidan

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper Then the v2, but Just as Good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because it was the same beautiful, RGB, Green switched, keyboard as the V2 edition with the wrist rest, which I didn't need. Super great, as it is comfortable even without the wrist rest that makes the V2 $30 dollars more. 10/10 Would buy again. P.S. Super great softare as well.
customer_reviews.author: Rob P

customer_reviews.title: Great Quailty lots of modes for color
customer_reviews.text: Its light and sturdy but have to give it a little bit more push if you want that clackly clicky sound
customer_reviews.author: Kevin M

customer_reviews.title: general appreciation
customer_reviews.text: this is a very nice keyboard (the clicking sound from the key presses is so satisfying). Fits perfectly with my small desk space and the customization is so simple that i have made a lighting profile for almost every game i regularly play. very durable design, i feel like i could throw it at a wall and it would be perfectly fine. (im not going to though, because that would be rude)
customer_reviews.author: joseph serilla

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love the keyboard with great mechanical clicks, Also loved the RGB in it
customer_reviews.author: hamood_d10

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my nephew as a gift. He LOVES it for his online game playing and has had no issue with it in the past year
customer_reviews.author: HnyBunee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Any Gamer or Anyone who love Mech Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Own 3 of these so yeah its worth a buy of you are old school mechanical keyboard lover This is an awesome keyboard - Period -
customer_reviews.author: I

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Love the keyboard, have had it for over a month now and it is perfect. Absolutely nothing wrong with it. The clicking sound the keys make everytime I press down on them is very satisfying to hear. Also, it doesn't take up too much space so it is very easy to carry around and set up wherever. Definitely 5 stars and worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very cool keyboard
customer_reviews.text: My 14 year old son loves his keyboard. This keyboard is smaller than the normal size. He specifically chose the smaller keyboard, he prefers the smaller size. The keyboard lights up with cool colors, which apparently makes it "sick", which is a good thing. My other son has the regular size keyboard and loves it. I would definitely recommend either tbe normal or smaller size of these keyboards.
customer_reviews.author: z

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good I like the case it comes in and unplugable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it's pretty nice otherwise
customer_reviews.text: The spacebar sometimes gets stuck depending on where I press it. it's pretty nice otherwise. I like that I only need one USB port for this, unlike the bigger version. Would've been nice to have USB passthrough or audio jacks, but it's not a big deal for me.
customer_reviews.author: OwO Wats Dis?

customer_reviews.title: there are better keys out there
customer_reviews.text: after 11 months of use two of the keys stopped working and some randomly doble press and i press them once i say its a pretty cool keyboard but there are better options out there too so just research before purchasing :)
customer_reviews.author: Steven Mata Polanco

customer_reviews.title: %100 worth the money, you won't look back once you go with a Razer product.
customer_reviews.text: The action on this and all Razer Keyboards are fantastic. This Keyboard and my last were completely worth the money I paid for. This is the first time I have opted to not have a keypad attached to a keyboard, so far I am loving it!
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Yanes III

customer_reviews.title: Best keyboard ever used!
customer_reviews.text: To start this product came to me on time and came with care. In the box there was no visible damage on anything and the keyboard worked fantastic. After using this for some time this is definitely a product to recommend. Razer has became my favorite brand for peripherals and this was a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Ethan

customer_reviews.title: Very good keyboard
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard is sturdy, responsive, and the lighting effects are really good. I would 10/10 recommend this to anyone looking for a decent gaming keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Amie Hayes

customer_reviews.title: NASTY!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this brand new and when i recieved the product as soon as i go to unbox it alot of dog hair on it and my actual keyboard has stains on it!
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Millan

customer_reviews.title: Broken key
customer_reviews.text: After almost 3 weeks of use, the number 1 button doesn't function at all anymore. It still clicks but doesn't work. Literally tried everything.
customer_reviews.author: Alucard

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Quality
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. I plugged it in once to my laptop and it never displayed the lights again when I plugged it I to my xbox. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: David Basin

customer_reviews.title: My boys LOVE this keyboard
customer_reviews.text: So many options for the lighting! My boys LOVE this keyboard! Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: DillyDally

customer_reviews.title: Not that good for a gaming key board
customer_reviews.text: the texture of the keyboard is just terrible. Too hard to hit down and the feedback is sometimes not that accurate too.
customer_reviews.author: Andy zhangggg

customer_reviews.title: A solid buy
customer_reviews.text: A very good keyboard, the only bad things I can think of are: gets dirty quick and very loud
customer_reviews.author: Caleb M

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: Im very happy with this Keyboard. A friend of mines recommended it and Im very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Trenton Cobb

customer_reviews.title: It’s a great (although expensive) keyboard with great RGB.
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard has been working perfectly for over two months now, and it pairs very nicely with my razer deathadder chroma v2.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Only thing that may be annoying to some is that there is no keypad on the side but it is a solid keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Ig

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Best keyboard I have owned. Very study and very clicky after 1 year of heavy use.
customer_reviews.author: Branden Chong

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: The driver inside the keyboard went out, after 6 months... useless
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Great keyboard, but if you use it on another ...
customer_reviews.text: Great keyboard, but if you use it on another computer, you have to install the razer cloud drive to get your profiles work.
customer_reviews.author: Lei Yao

customer_reviews.title: Keyboard for my super picky son.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son for Christmas.He loves it.Super nice keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: DKG

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My 12 year old loves this keyboard! Lots of gaming functions and keyboard lighting. He loves the clicked sound too! His favorite Christmas gift!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect. This is a well-built durable keyboard that is a joy to type on. Definitely worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Graham Palmgren

customer_reviews.title: Razergear collection complete!
customer_reviews.text: Not my first razer gear, waited for it for a long time! Love using it, the feel of a mechanical keyboard beats any keyboard out there
customer_reviews.author: Mephisto

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Works great love the size of the keyboard fits nice on my desk the only bad thing is not all the effects made by the community are compatible
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better one!!
customer_reviews.text: feels better. I had a blackwidow 2016. And this one. Feels much better when I playing the LOL.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a horribly uncomfortable, loud keyboard.
customer_reviews.text: First off, I understand that this is a "clicky" mechanical keyboard, but the noise it makes drowns out game-play sounds. It's ridiculous. Second, I do not get the design choice of the space bar. The front edge of it is higher than the rest of the key, so your thumb rests on a thin edge. It is very uncomfortable after only a few minutes of game-time. Beyond that, the keyboard seems to be well built and the back lighting is quite bright. Mine went back and I'll be continuing to use my 8 year old Logitech G15.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: It's all great! And I really enjoy using it with the ...
customer_reviews.text: It's all great!And I really enjoy using it with the tic tac sound:)
customer_reviews.author: Franck

customer_reviews.title: other than that I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: the enter key doesn't work properly, other than that I love this thing. Best keyboard ever, except its a bummer the enter doesn't work well
customer_reviews.author: Gabi

customer_reviews.title: Excelent Refurbished product
customer_reviews.text: As a refubrished it came in perfect conditions almost as new for not saying new. Arrived even with the carry case and stickers, everything working on point just what i expected 11/10 for this refubrished to be honest. Mine said refubrished/recertified by manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Marin Zapata

customer_reviews.title: Shiny~
customer_reviews.text: The best part of buying this keyboard was the unboxing. Razer really knows how to deliver quality to their customers.
customer_reviews.author: Benjee

customer_reviews.title: Please don't buy this.
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard is very low quality for the price. I bought this a few months back and it worked great. I loved it, and I considered my self lucky since multiple of my friend's broke. Fast forward to a few months later. Multiple of the keys don't work, get stuck, or pop out of the switch. Typing on it seemed to take so long because the keys were not working. The software is flimsy and crashes. Please don't waste your money on this. Go buy something from Corsair or Logitech G. I find their products amazing and their software comfy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: -1 star, read why
customer_reviews.text: Layout took some getting used to moving from 10keyless to/from full size. -1 star otherwise as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler K.

customer_reviews.title: keyboard stops working by itself got a factory defect item
customer_reviews.text: So i recently got my keyboard last thursday and when i was trying out to put colors on my keyboard it suddenly disconnects by itself. It's so frustrating since i was looking forward to playing on the weekend. Can i return this keyboard and get another one? i actually think that the keyboard i got is a factory defect cause if you try to move the keyboard and you hit the cord a little then the keyboard stops working. Can someone help me please?
customer_reviews.author: a

customer_reviews.title: I like it but I don't like it.
customer_reviews.text: I love the colors and how customizable it is. A+ on that. I also love how the mechanical keys feel. But frankly, the typing experience in not that great. I went from using a macbook keyboard that is super easy to type on and feels great. But like the mechanical keyboard feel great but if you are trying to type an essay or something it is not really comfortable and you will make a lot of mistakes, it will probably take you a lot of time to get used to the feeling of this keyboard if your like me coming from the macbook keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: elikairivera

customer_reviews.title: Love the chroma
customer_reviews.text: Chroma is so cool though u hardly notice it after a whilen
customer_reviews.author: BigTimeGames

customer_reviews.title: Feels good, sounds loud
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard feels great and is a good fit for gaming and/or even programming as long as you don't mind the noise. It is very loud.
customer_reviews.author: Stanislav Listopad

product_meta.title: Razer BlackWidow Tournament Edition Chroma, Clicky RGB Mechanical Gaming Keyboard, Compact Layout - Razer Green Switches
product_meta.description: Razer BlackWidow Tournament Edition Chroma RGB Mechanical Gaming Keyboard
feature_bullets: Multi-Award winning Razer Mechanical Switches - Razer Green Switch Clicky keys with optimized tactile feel
Extreme Durability- Razer mechanical switches are rated up to 80 million keystrokes and come with a 2-year warranty
Powered by Razer Chroma – Individually programmable backlit keys with 16.8 million color options
Detachable braided fiber USB cable with cable strap and premium carry case for easy portability
Compact layout and fully programmable keys with on-the-fly macro recording, 10 key roll-over anti-ghosting

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars192 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
